column4: hi, i have a pc with Windows XP, but since i do not want to upgrade to Vista i decided to install Ubuntu and give it a try
i've heard a lot about Ubuntu... could anyone please help me with a location on how to install it?
haha
because i don't want to do away with Xp right away... as i can play games there
ok thanks
oh cool
i guess i chose the right time then! i will wait for a few hours :)
meanwhile i will read up the documents you gave me... thanks
xp is an excellent excelletn os
i concur... excellent but it is getting old, so i thought why not try the new ones that are admired by people :)
i like your thinking...
its also worth considering an os not just from  a personal (egotistical perspective if you like, for want of a better term) and also from wider social and philosophical point of view...
xp is a great os and Ubuntu is not half bad either... but xp is not open-source or supports open source fundamentals which ubuntu does
i suppose ubuntu will be as good as xp, may also be like what vista should have been
what do you mean by good? in many respects Ubuntu is already much better than any windows os has ever been
i meant no disrespect, i am sure it is better in certain respects
mc44 forbids me to speak any more on this topic here
yeah i'll not thanks i will read the docs now to get myself familiar with Ubuntu better till the new version comes out
no entiendo?
new version is out today
